heisigStory: Slingshot . . . one. Later we shall learn the character for give (Frame 2046), but even so, it is a good idea already at this point to distinguish this key word from impart (Frame 795) and grant (Frame 1131).
koohiiStory1: David went to battle with a slingshot and it only took him one shot to slay Goliath. Partly because of this, the prophet Nathan was later instructed to bestow upon David the throne of all Israel.
koohiiStory2: In The Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time, one of the first weapons bestowed on Link was the slingshot.
kunYomi: あた.える、あずか.る、くみ.する、ともに
words:
関与(かんよ): participation, taking part in, participating in, being concerned in
寄与(きよ): contribution, service
与党(よとう): government party, (ruling) party in power, government
与える(あたえる): give, to award
給与(きゅうよ): allowance, grant, supply
